mapper.select: SELECT p_name,p_code,p_module,p_url,c1_name,c1_module,c1_code,c1_url,c2_module,c2_name,c2_url,c2_code, c3.module_name AS c3_name , c3.module_code AS c3_code, c3.link_url AS c3_url, c3.parent_module AS c3_module FROM sys_module AS c3 RIGHT JOIN(SELECT p.module_name AS p_name , p.module_code AS p_code , p.parent_module AS p_module , p.link_url AS p_url , c1.module_name AS c1_name , c1.parent_module AS c1_module, c1.module_code AS c1_code, c1.link_url AS c1_url, c2.parent_module AS c2_module, c2.module_name AS c2_name, c2.module_code AS c2_code, c2.link_url AS c2_url FROM user_info AS u JOIN sys_user_role AS ur JOIN sys_role AS r JOIN sys_role_fun AS f JOIN sys_module AS p JOIN sys_module AS c1 JOIN sys_module AS c2 ON p.module_code=c1.parent_module AND c1.module_code=c2.parent_module AND p.module_code='0101' AND u.user_id=ur.user_id AND ur.role_id=r.role_code AND r.role_code=f.role_id AND f.module_id=c2.module_code AND u.`username`=#{username}) AS pp ON c3.parent_module=pp.c2_code

SELECT p_name,p_code,p_module,p_url,c1_name,c1_module,c1_code,c1_url,c2_module,c2_name,c2_url,c2_code, c3.module_name AS c3_name , c3.module_code AS c3_code, c3.link_url AS c3_url, c3.parent_module AS c3_module FROM sys_module AS c3 RIGHT JOIN(SELECT p.module_name AS p_name , p.module_code AS p_code , p.parent_module AS p_module , p.link_url AS p_url , c1.module_name AS c1_name , c1.parent_module AS c1_module, c1.module_code AS c1_code, c1.link_url AS c1_url, c2.parent_module AS c2_module, c2.module_name AS c2_name, c2.module_code AS c2_code, c2.link_url AS c2_url FROM user_info AS u JOIN sys_user_role AS ur JOIN sys_role AS r JOIN sys_role_fun AS f JOIN sys_module AS p JOIN sys_module AS c1 JOIN sys_module AS c2 ON p.module_code=c1.parent_module AND c1.module_code=c2.parent_module AND p.module_code='0101' AND u.user_id=ur.user_id AND ur.role_id=r.role_code AND r.role_code=f.role_id AND f.module_id=c2.module_code) AS pp ON c3.parent_module=pp.c2_code
